# Beep

<section class="intro">

Beep boop.

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

<!-- Desired comment format -->

<!-- run a: false, b: [ "error", 10 ], c: null -->

```javascript
var path = require( 'path' );
```

#### path.posix.join( [...paths] )

Joins a path.

<!-- Sloppy comment -->

<!--    run    foo: "bar", beep: true,    boop:2     -->

```javascript
var p = path.posix.join( 'foo', 'bar' );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

</section>

var x = 3.14;
